name: Drampa
description: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Spiral Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
